meanings.definition: The projecting part of the lower jaw or chin.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her mentum, feeling the smooth curve of her chin.
meanings.sent2: His mentum was strong and defined, giving him a confident look.
meanings.sent3: The mentum on his face seemed to have a mind of its own, moving as he spoke.
meanings.sent4: Her mentum jutted out defiantly, showing her determination.
meanings.sent5: The mentum on the statue was so detailed, it looked almost real.

meanings.sent1: The insect's mentum helped it grasp onto the leaf tightly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the tiny mentum of the beetle under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The ant's mentum wiggled comically as it carried a crumb many times its size.
meanings.sent4: The butterfly's mentum was delicate, like a tiny work of art.
meanings.sent5: The mantis used its mentum to carefully clean its antennae.
